dimension: 150 x 108 x 5 in. (381 x 274.32 x 12.7 cm) (approximate, assembled)
title: Torah ark from Fargo Hebrew Congregation synagogue
description: architectural element with top arch portion, electrified, with Hebrew text in red below arch of bulbs; lower cabinet flanked by pairs of pillars; front railing included; received disassembled
creditline: Gift of the Fargo Hebrew Congregation
